title: Judge Dredd versus Judge Death (Including Necropolis)
description:
This folder contains an exhaustive collection of stories from the Judge Dredd Universe related to Judge Death, the Dark Judges and the Sisters of Death.

The complete Necropolis arc is included, from the introduction of Judge Kraken in 2000 AD prog. 0583 to the "Plagues of Necropolis" series which ran many years later in the Megazines. Many of these stories do not involve Dredd or Death directly but are an integral part of the arc.

I've numbered the stories as collections in logical reading order, meaning not all issues are numbered in the chronological order the magazines were printed.

There are two extras:

Diceman #1 - a short-lived series of fantasy game comics using 2000AD characters.

Extreme X01 Judge Death Special - This is a collection of Judge Death stories which were used as the basis for the "Judge Dredd: Dredd versus Death" video game.
